attributes.action: To  bring out new law to stop all the fraud marriages from around the world ,
attributes.background: To bring out new laws to stop these fraudulent marriages , and to deport these people straight away back to the country they come from , Pakistan, India , Bangladesh as it is very high  from these countries to see together if we can stop these .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want to start a new petition you'd need to provide your full name.
